column4: A re-creation of the merciless 1970s rivalry between Formula One rivals James Hunt and Niki Lauda.
Katniss Everdeen and Peeta Mellark become targets of the Capitol after their victory in the 74th Hunger Games sparks a rebellion in the Districts of Panem.
The haunted Lambert family seeks to uncover the mysterious childhood secret that has left them dangerously connected to the spirit world.
The X-Men send Wolverine to the past to change a major historical event that could globally impact man and mutant kind.
A mechanic and his daughter make a discovery that brings down Autobots and Decepticons - and a paranoid government official - on them.
An FBI agent and an Interpol detective track a team of illusionists who pull off bank heists during their performances and reward their audiences with the money.
A medical engineer and an astronaut work together to survive after an accident leaves them adrift in space.
A veteran pot dealer creates a fake family as part of his plan to move a huge shipment of weed into the U.S. from Mexico.
A Midwestern war veteran finds himself drawn to the past and lifestyle of his millionaire neighbor.
Spider-Man squares off against the Rhino and the powerful Electro while struggling to keep his promise to leave Gwen Stacey out of his dangerous life.
Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse.

column2: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs 2
column4: Flint Lockwood now works at The Live Corp Company for his idol Chester V. But he's forced to leave his post when he learns that his most infamous machine is still operational and is churning out menacing food-animal hybrids.
A man who has made a new life for himself and the daughter left on his doorstep 6 years ago finds his family threatened when the birth mother resurfaces.
Hobbs has Dom and Brian reassemble their crew in order to take down a mastermind who commands an organization of mercenary drivers across 12 countries. Payment? Full pardons for them all.
The U.S. government recruits Machete to battle his way through Mexico in order to take down an arms dealer who looks to launch a weapon into space.
Five friends who reunite in an attempt to top their epic pub crawl from 20 years earlier unwittingly become humankind's only hope for survival.

A teenager finds herself transported to a deep forest setting where a battle between the forces of good and the forces of evil is taking place. She bands together with a rag-tag group characters in order to save their world -- and ours.
Nick Fury of S.H.I.E.L.D. assembles a team of superhumans to save the planet from Loki and his army.
A veteran assigned to extract Earth's remaining resources begins to question what he knows about his mission and himself.
Gru is recruited by the Anti-Villain League to help deal with a powerful new super criminal.
A trio of bodybuilders in Florida get caught up in an extortion ring and a kidnapping scheme that goes terribly wrong.
The story of Steve Jobs' ascension from college dropout into one of the most revered creative entrepreneurs of the 20th century.
A drama centered on a group of people searching for human connections in today's wired world.
A young itinerant worker is forced to confront his secret extraterrestrial heritage when Earth is invaded by members of his race.
Two roommates deathly afraid of ghosts both fall in love with a girl who believes their home is haunted.
A family looks to prevent evil spirits from trapping their comatose child in a realm called The Further.
A giant radioactive monster called Godzilla awakens from its slumber to wreak destruction on its creators.
Four college girls who land in jail after robbing a restaurant in order to fund their spring break vacation find themselves bailed out by a drug and arms dealer who wants them to do some dirty work.
A recently slain cop joins a team of undead police officers working for the Rest in Peace Department and tries to find the man who murdered him.
A group of astronaut explorers succumb one by one to a mysterious and terrifying force while collecting specimens on Mars.

An operative for an elite private intelligence firm finds her priorities changing dramatically after she is tasked with infiltrating an anarchist group known for executing covert attacks upon major corporations.
Two young boys encounter a fugitive and form a pact to help him evade the bounty hunters on his trail and to reunite him with his true love.
A cropdusting plane with a fear of heights lives his dream of competing in a famous around-the-world aerial race.
A young woman's world unravels when a drug prescribed by her psychiatrist has unexpected side effects.
Dorothy Gale is swept away to a magical land in a tornado and embarks on a quest to see the Wizard who can help her return home.
A skilled extractor is offered a chance to regain his old life as payment for a task considered to be impossible.
A love story between influential filmmaker Alfred Hitchcock and wife Alma Reville during the filming of [link=tt0054215] in 1959.

column2: The Perks of Being a Wallflower
column4: An introvert freshman is taken under the wings of two seniors who welcome him to the real world.
An Alaska State Trooper partners with a young woman who escaped the clutches of serial killer Robert Hansen to bring the murderer to justice. Based on actual events.
A poor and passionate young man falls in love with a rich young woman and gives her a sense of freedom. They soon are separated by their social differences.
An uptight FBI Special Agent is paired with a foul-mouthed Boston cop to take down a ruthless drug lord.
The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.
A divorced woman who decides to pursue the man she's interested in learns he's her new friend's ex-husband.
The cross-country adventures of two good-hearted but incredibly stupid friends.
A lawyer finds himself in over his head when he gets involved in drug trafficking.
King Leonidas and a force of 300 men fight the Persians at Thermopylae in 480 B.C.
An vengeful barbarian warrior sets off to get his revenge on the evil warlord who attacked his village and murdered his father when he was a boy.
Tensions rise between lifelong friends Mitchell and Carter after their truck breaks down on an isolated desert road as they start to attack each other's life decisions with unwavering brutality.
A small-time magician is swept away to an enchanted land and is forced into a power struggle between three witches.
A series of interconnected short films follows a washed-up producer as he pitches insane story lines featuring some of the biggest stars in Hollywood.
The G.I. Joes are not only fighting their mortal enemy Cobra; they are forced to contend with threats from within the government that jeopardize their very existence.

column2: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
column4: A meek hobbit of The Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to Mount Doom to destroy the One Ring and the dark lord Sauron.
Retired C.I.A. agent Frank Moses reunites his unlikely team of elite operatives for a global quest to track down a missing portable nuclear device.
A pair of underachieving cops are sent back to a local high school to blend in and bring down a synthetic drug ring.
A freak accident might just help an everyday garden snail achieve his biggest dream: winning the Indy 500.
Oakland A's general manager Billy Beane's successful attempt to assemble a baseball team on a lean budget by employing computer-generated analysis to acquire new players.
The rivalry between two magicians becomes more exacerbated by their attempt to perform the ultimate illusion.
An overgrown nerd who serves as Grand Master of a fantasy board game finds his role as leader of the misfits put into jeopardy when a new initiate enters the group.
A pair of childhood friends and neighbors fall for each other's sons.
The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island individuals are shattered when their addictions become stronger.
A look at the relationship between Mike and Sulley during their days at Monsters University -- when they weren't necessarily the best of friends.
A recounting of the chaotic events that occurred at Dallas' Parkland Hospital on the day U.S. President John F. Kennedy was assassinated.
An art auctioneer who has become mixed up with a group of criminals partners with a hypnotherapist in order to recover a lost painting.
A teenage girl risks everything when she falls in love with a vampire.
The life story of Jackie Robinson and his history-making signing with the Brooklyn Dodgers under the guidance of team executive Branch Rickey.
A couple with a newborn baby face unexpected difficulties after they are forced to live next to a fraternity house.
A young F.B.I. cadet must confide in an incarcerated and manipulative killer to receive his help on catching another serial killer who skins his victims.
A documentary that follows top bodybuilders as they train to compete in the Mr. Olympia competition.
Henry Hill and his friends work their way up through the mob hierarchy.
The true story of a newly appointed African-American coach and his high school team on their first season as a racially integrated unit.
A long-divorced couple fakes being married as their family unites for a wedding.
A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.
A homicide investigator digs deeper into a case involving a trained military sniper who shot five random victims.
A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.
Annabel and Lucas are faced with the challenge of raising his young nieces that were left alone in the forest for 5 years.... but how alone were they?
Two co-dependent high school seniors are forced to deal with separation anxiety after their plan to stage a booze-soaked party goes awry.
A modern retelling of Shakespeare's classic comedy about two pairs of lovers with different takes on romance and a way with words.
Three sixty-something friends take a break from their day-to-day lives to throw a bachelor party in Las Vegas for their last remaining single pal.
A vengeful father escapes from hell and chases after the men who killed his daughter and kidnapped his granddaughter.
Centers on a young girl who has been murdered and watches over her family - and her killer - from purgatory. She must weigh her desire for vengeance against her desire for her family to heal.
Three friends conspire to murder their awful bosses when they realize they are standing in the way of their happiness.
A mermaid princess makes a Faustian bargain with an unscrupulous sea-witch in order to meet a human prince on land.
We meet Jesse and Celine nine years on in Greece. Almost two decades have passed since their first meeting on that train bound for Vienna.
Pot growers Ben and Chon face off against the Mexican drug cartel who kidnapped their shared girlfriend.
A true-crime writer finds a cache of 8mm home movies films that suggest the murder he is currently researching is the work of a serial killer whose career dates back to the 1960s.
A group of kids embark on a wild adventure after finding a pirate treasure map.

column2: Percy Jackson & the Olympians: The Lightning Thief
column4: A teenager discovers he's the descendant of a Greek god and sets out on an adventure to settle an on-going battle between the gods.
Scott Pilgrim must defeat his new girlfriend's seven evil exes in order to win her heart.
A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.
A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape Earth and return to his home-world.

column2: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
column4: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

column2: Sin City: A Dame to Kill For
column4: The town's most hard boiled citizens cross paths with some of its more reviled inhabitants.
A pair of aging boxing rivals are coaxed out of retirement to fight one final bout -- 30 years after their last match.

column2: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty
column4: An office worker who lives inside fantasy worlds where he gets to live an adventurous life while romancing his co-worker sets off a global journey to fix things when both of their jobs are threatened.
A process server and his marijuana dealer wind up on the run from hitmen and a corrupt police officer after he witness his dealer's boss murder a competitor while trying to serve papers on him.
An international crew of astronauts undertakes a privately funded mission to search for life on Jupiter's fourth largest moon.
An American girl on holiday in the English countryside with her family finds herself in hiding and fighting for her survival as the third world war breaks out.
Revolves around a monster attack in New York as told from the point of view of a small group of people.
A clean-cut high school student relies on the school's rumor mill to advance her social and financial standing.
An undercover FBI agent becomes a vigilante assassin and sets out to unleash vengeance upon the corrupt businessman who slew his family.
The story of a tourist family in Thailand caught in the destruction and chaotic aftermath of the 2004 Indian Ocean tsunami.
A professional assassin rescues a young girl whose parents were killed in a police raid.
English teacher John Keating inspires his students to a love of poetry and to seize the day.
Two British comic-book geeks traveling across the U.S. encounter an alien outside Area 51.
A woman suffering from Parkinson's befriends a drug rep working for Pfizer against 1990s Pittsburgh backdrop.
Follow two couples as they journey from the bar to the bedroom and are eventually put to the test in the real world.
A group of professional bank robbers start to feel the heat from police when they unknowingly leave a clue at their latest heist.
Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and more than two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.
A Hawaiian girl adopts an unusual pet who is actually a notorious extra-terrestrial fugitive from the law.
An abandoned boy is lured to America and drawn into the shadow of a dangerous father figure. Inspired by the real life events that led to the 2002 Beltway sniper attacks.

column2: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales
column4: The fifth installment of the blockbuster franchise that follows the adventures of Captain Jack Sparrow.
Mild-mannered businessman Sandy Patterson travels from Denver to Florida to confront the deceptively harmless-looking woman who has been living it up after stealing Sandy's identity.

column2: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
column4: Harry finds himself mysteriously selected as an under-aged competitor in a dangerous tournament between three schools of magic.
A band of samurai set out to avenge the death and dishonor of their master at the hands of a ruthless shogun.
A small-town girl ventures to Los Angeles and finds her place in a neo-burlesque club run by a former dancer.
A dissenting juror in a murder trial slowly manages to convince the others that the case is not as obviously clear as it seemed in court.
Shakespeare's famous play is updated to the hip modern suburb of Verona still retaining its original dialogue.
A newly engaged couple have a breakdown in an isolated area and must pay a call to the bizarre residence of Dr. Frank-N-Furter.

Former race-car driver Brent Magna is pitted against the clock when his wife is kidnapped by a mysterious villain. He commandeers a young woman's car and takes her on on a high-speed race against time.

Four young men who belong to a supernatural legacy are forced to battle a fifth power long thought to have died out. Another great force they must contend with is the jealousy and suspicion that threatens to tear them apart.
A fleet of ships is forced to do battle with an armada of unknown origins in order to discover and thwart their destructive goals.
Danny Ocean and his eleven accomplices plan to rob three Las Vegas casinos simultaneously.
Four socially troubled 18-year-olds from the south of England go on holiday to Malia.
Los Angeles police officer Brian O'Connor must decide where his loyalties really lie when he becomes enamored with the street racing world he has been sent undercover to destroy.
The story of a forbidden and secretive relationship between two cowboys and their lives over the years.
A father goes undercover for the DEA in order to free his son who was imprisoned after being set up in drug deal.
Dominic Toretto and his crew of street racers plan a massive heist to buy their freedom while in the sights of a powerful Brazilian drug lord and a dangerous federal agent.

The space vessel Nostromo and its crew receive a distress call from a alien planet. After searching for survivors that planet they head back home only to realize that an deadly alien life form has joined them.
A thriller centered on a young man who sets out to uncover the truth about his life after finding his baby photo on a missing persons website.
A struggling screenwriter inadvertently becomes entangled in the Los Angeles criminal underworld after his oddball friends kidnap a gangster's beloved Shih Tzu.
A quartet of mutated humanoid turtles clash with an uprising criminal gang of ninjas.
A determined woman works with a hardened boxing trainer to become a professional.
Agent J travels in time to M.I.B.'s early days in 1969 to stop an alien from assassinating his friend Agent K and changing history.
A former Weather Underground activist goes on the run from a journalist who has discovered his identity.
A demystified take on the tale of King Arthur and the Knights of the Round Table.
A group of teenagers look to save their town from an invasion of North Korean soldiers.
Two sisters find their already strained relationship challenged as a mysterious new planet threatens to collide with Earth.
A San Francisco cartoonist becomes an amateur detective obsessed with tracking down the Zodiac killer.
A Naval veteran arrives home from war unsettled and uncertain of his future - until he is tantalized by The Cause and its charismatic leader.
Two mutants come to a private academy for their kind whose resident superhero team must oppose a terrorist organization with similar powers.
A land baron tries to re-connect with his two daughters after his wife is seriously injured in a boating accident.
A young journalist must investigate a mysterious videotape which seems to cause the death of anyone in a week of viewing it.
A post-apocalyptic tale of a man and his son trying to survive by any means possible.
A man seeks out his exact look-alike after spotting him in a movie.
A son tries to learn more about his dying father by reliving stories and myths he told about his life.
A group of explorers make use of a newly discovered wormhole to surpass the limitations on human space travel and conquer the vast distances involved in an interstellar voyage.
The Bride wakens from a four-year coma. The child she carried in her womb is gone. Now she must wreak vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her - a team she was once part of.
A boy who communicates with spirits that don't know they're dead seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.

The son of a virtual world designer goes looking for his father and ends up inside the digital world that his father designed. He meets his father's creation turned bad and a unique ally who was born inside the digital domain of The Grid.
A story centered on an eccentric art auctioneer and his obsession with an heiress/collector.
A teenager suspects that his new neighbor is a vampire.
A faded movie star and a neglected young wife form an unlikely bond after crossing paths in Tokyo.
An extraterrestrial race forced to live in slum-like conditions on Earth suddenly finds a kindred spirit in a government agent who is exposed to their biotechnology.
A high school biology teacher looks to become a successful mixed-martial arts fighter in an effort to raise money to prevent extra-curricular activities from being axed at his cash-strapped school.
Two mismatched New York City detectives seize an opportunity to step up like the city's top cops whom they idolize -- only things don't quite go as planned.

Artie and Diane agree to look after their three grandkids when their type-A helicopter parents need to leave town for work. Problems arise when the kids' 21st-century behavior collides with Artie and Diane's old-school methods.

column2: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift
column4: Alabama teenager Sean Boswell becomes a major competitor in the world of drift racing after moving in with his father in Tokyo to avoid a jail sentence in America.
Author P. L. Travers reflects on her difficult childhood while meeting with filmmaker Walt Disney during production for the adaptation of her eponymous novel.

column2: He's Just Not That Into You
column4: The Baltimore-set movie of interconnecting story arcs deals with the challenges of reading or misreading human behavior.

column2: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas
column4: An oddball journalist and his psychopathic lawyer travel to Las Vegas for a series of psychedelic escapades.
Allied POWs plan for several hundred of their number to escape from a German camp during World War II.
A young Greek woman falls in love with a non-Greek and struggles to get her family to accept him while she comes to terms with her heritage and cultural identity.
Plot unknown.
A Marine travels to Louisiana after serving three tours in Iraq and searches for the unknown woman he believes was his good luck charm during the war.

The hot-headed young D'Artagnan along with three former legendary but now down on their luck Musketeers must unite and defeat a beautiful double agent and her villainous employer from seizing the French throne and engulfing Europe in war.
An action thriller centered on a soldier who wakes up in the body of an unknown man and discovers he's part of a mission to find the bomber of a Chicago commuter train.

column2: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
column4: Set back in the 80s when Harry met Lloyd in high school where they cross paths with a mean principal and a bunch of other outcasts much like themselves.
A CIA operative hires a team of mercenaries to eliminate a Latin dictator and a renegade CIA agent.
The son of the Greek Gods Zeus and Hera is stripped of his immortality as an infant and must become a true hero in order to reclaim it.
A lonely writer develops an unlikely relationship with his newly-purchased operating system that's designed to meet his every need.
A crew of Americans in Nazi Germany toward the end of World War II embark on a brave mission.
Fraternal twins set out to rid Boston of the evil men operating there while being tracked down by an FBI agent.
The tragic death of a beautiful young girl starts a tense and atmospheric game of cat and mouse between hunter John Moon and the hardened backwater criminals out for his blood.
Detective Sherlock Holmes and his stalwart partner Watson engage in a battle of wits and brawn with a nemesis whose plot is a threat to all of England.
Members of an elite DEA task force find themselves being taken down one by one after they rob a drug cartel safe house.

column2: The Adventures of Sharkboy and Lavagirl 3-D
column4: A boy dreams up shark-boy and lava-girl and the horror that lies within their planet.
The crew of the ship Serenity tries to evade an assassin sent to recapture one of their number who is telepathic.
Jason Bourne dodges a ruthless CIA official and his agents from a new assassination program while searching for the origins of his life as a trained killer.
The CDC races against time to develop a vaccine against an extremely lethal virus.
An underachieving voice coach finds herself competing in the movie trailer voice-over profession against her arrogant father and his protege.
A newly released ex-con and former US Ranger finds himself trapped in a prisoner transport plane when the passengers seize control.

column2: Harold & Kumar Go to White Castle
column4: An Asian-American office worker and his Indian-American stoner friend embark on a quest to satisfy their desire for White Castle burgers.
A high-school boy is given the chance to write a story for Rolling Stone Magazine about an up-and-coming rock band as he accompanies it on their concert tour.
Two top CIA operatives wage an epic battle against one another after they discover they are dating the same woman.
A man marries his landlady so he can take advantage of her daughter.
A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.
A week in the life of a young singer as he navigates the Greenwich Village folk scene of 1961.
A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.
A toon hating detective is a cartoon rabbit's only hope to prove his innocence when he is accused of murder.
A comedy centered on an idealist who barges into the lives of his three sisters.
Three magazine employees head out on an assignment to interview a guy who placed a classified ad seeking a companion for time travel.
An industrial worker who hasn't slept in a year begins to doubt his own sanity.
Daniel Ocean recruits one more team member so he can pull off three major European heists in this sequel to Ocean's 11.
123 elite U.S. soldiers drop into Somalia to capture two top lieutenants of a renegade warlord and find themselves in a desperate battle with a large force of heavily-armed Somalis.
Alice fights alongside a resistance movement in the continuing battle against the Umbrella Corporation and the undead.
A young widow discovers that her late husband has left her 10 messages intended to help ease her pain and start a new life.
A family determined to get their young daughter into the finals of a beauty pageant take a cross-country trip in their VW bus.
Sparks fly when Wade Walker crashes the Peeples annual reunion in the Hamptons to ask for their precious daughter Grace's hand in marriage.
The canine star of a fictional sci-fi/action show that believes his powers are real embarks on a cross country trek to save his co-star from a threat he believes is just as real.
A struggling salesman takes custody of his son as he's poised to begin a life-changing professional endeavor.
A high-profile terrorism case unexpectedly binds together two ex-lovers on the defense team - testing the limits of their loyalties and placing their lives in jeopardy.

column2: Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time
column4: A young fugitive prince and princess must stop a villain who unknowingly threatens to destroy the world with a special dagger that enables the magic sand inside to reverse time.
A mid-life crisis plagued man and his friends find renewal and purpose on a cattle driving vacation.
The Dark Knight of Gotham City begins his war on crime with his first major enemy being the clownishly homicidal Joker.
